page.title: 12TRANSPORT-FUTURE SPACECRAFT
page.content: My aircraft design is designed for comfort and elegance,also speed and economics.It is powered by three rectangular shaped thrusters at the rear of the plane which are powered by a nuclear engine stored inside the plane.Inside the plane there are two leather seats for the driver and one passenger and in the back there are seats for two other passengers.Also in the back there is a television,drinks cabinet and games computer. The dashboard is highly modified and has every appliance to assist the driver.Outside it has a sleek metallic finish with two scarlet stripes down each side and wing.Another advantage of this aircraft is that the nuclear waste is destroyed by a harmless chemical stored at the back of the aircraft.
